title: Eugene McCann Releases The Journey of My Life
text:
Inspiring story shows one man’s incredible courage, faith
NORTH PLAINFEILD, N.J. (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Author Eugene McCann has suffered from the disease known as epilepsy since he was a child. And throughout the years he has experienced all sorts of challenges that tested his courage and faith. And yet despite it all he was still able to look at life with optimism.
“ The Journey of My Life ” (published by Xlibris) is a diary that contains the author’s many experiences in life. It shows how he struggled with his condition and was despondent at first. But through God ’s help he was able to accept his lot in life and achieve things that he never dreamed possible. Now he has found his true calling and is a monk of the Benedictine order .
The author also wishes to show readers that no matter what the consequences in one life are, as long as one looks hard enough, there is always a value in everything one sees and hears. The author’s great wish is to help others in their many challenges in life and to inspire them to greater heights of possibility.
The book also places great emphasis in the power of God’s love and shows that race, religion or gender does not matter, all that matters is that one accepts God into one’s life.
“The Journey of My Life”
By Eugene McCann

About the Author
Eugene McCann has had epilepsy since birth and he has had a very hard time living with it. He has had a very difficult life and yet he has come to realize the value in life and that whatever happened to him has worked out because it has led him into the path of becoming a monk.
